item.title: Thousands of Palestinians flee as Israeli troops push into Gaza City
item.description: Israel says its aim is to defeat up to 3,000 Hamas fighters who remain there, but the offensive has drawn international condemnation.

item.title: Madeleine McCann suspect freed from German prison
item.description: Christian Br√ºckner has never been charged with any crime in relation to the McCann case.

item.title: Eritrean man wins block on removal from UK to France under 'one in, one out' deal
item.description: Some migrants who arrived in the UK by small boat had been told they would be put on flights to France as early as Tuesday.

item.title: Champions League debut and Luiz - the rise of Pafos
item.description: BBC Sport looks at Pafos FC, the team from Cyprus set to make their full Champions League debut with David Luiz in defence.

item.title: 'The hungry can't stay silent' - behind deadly protests in oil-rich Angola
item.description: As the 50th independence anniversary approaches the country grapples with poverty and inequality.
